Transcription for 1013691

reflector
The water flows, the water flows,
And the river flows before.
The waves and the ocean waves,
They line the water trial.
The water can find the way of life,
And it is the right last way.
Through the muddy draft the waters are drawn,
And the river flows before.
And the water is drawn,
And the water is drawn,
And the river flows before.
The water is drawn,
And the water is drawn,
And the river flows before.
And the water is drawn,
And the river flows before.
And the river flows before.
